author: Jedd_the_Jedi
title: Good for gifts
review: This set is great for gifts (like how I received it), with three prominent minifig-magnets that work great as play figures too. The magnets are surprisingly strong, so you can stick them on the fridge door. Everything can be separated as per normal (unlike in keychains) except for the magnet legs. A pity, but excellent anyway!

author: Mexell
title: Feel the Force
review: These magnets do have a 'force'ful attraction to metal.  There is a magnet in each leg and one inside the torso (which is probably why the legs are glued on).  Except for these two pieces, the minifigs come apart.  Make up your own character magnets!  Fully assembled they can connect to bricks just like a normal figure.  Sets of 3 magnet figures range from $14.99-9.99 USD which makes each character kinda pricey.  If the price was lower this set would score a 5.

author: Jonamaster
title: dude...This set is GREAT!!
review:
I mean..you get a HOOD, DARTH VADER, CHEWBACCA!,  OBI-WAN!!
A RED LIGHT SABA!! A BLUE LIGHT SABA!


I got this set for $10.99 but it was worth it!

PRRFECT FOR GIFTS! ( if yur a collector of star wars lego)

-jonamaster
